mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adcontents(adcontentsno, adminsno, cateno, title, content, recom, viewcnt, commentcnt, passwd, tag, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, id) VALUES (adcontents_seq.nextval, #{adminsno}, #{cateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{recom}, #{viewcnt}, #{commentcnt}, #{passwd}, #{tag}, sysdate, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT adcontentsno, adminsno, cateno, title, content, recom, viewcnt, commentcnt, passwd, tag, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, id FROM adcontents ORDER BY adcontentsno DESC

SELECT adcontentsno, adminsno, cateno, title, content, recom, viewcnt, commentcnt, passwd, tag, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, id FROM adcontents WHERE adcontentsno = #{adcontentsno}

SELECT adcontentsno, adminsno, cateno, title, content, recom, viewcnt, commentcnt, passwd, tag, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, id FROM adcontents WHERE adcontentsno = #{adcontentsno}

SELECT adcontentsno, adminsno, cateno, title, content, recom, viewcnt, commentcnt, passwd, tag, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, id FROM adcontents
WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(tag) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY adcontentsno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM adcontents
WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(tag) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')

SELECT adcontentsno, adminsno, cateno, title, content, recom, viewcnt, commentcnt, passwd, tag, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube, id FROM adcontents
WHERE cateno=#{cateno}
WHERE cateno=#{cateno} AND (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(tag) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY adcontentsno DESC
